text:
Dj 4Rain (born as Stephan Tavares) is an electronic and hip hop French DJ producer.
Career.
In 2015 Dj 4Rain went to Miami to meet Dutch musician JLV who introduced him to sound engineer Tory Lanez. They quickly started working and collaborating on Meek Mill's album "Dreams Worth More Than Money" that was ranked number 1 on the Billboard US chart and received a platinum distinction.
In 2017, they are nominated for the Grammy Awards for their participation on Tory Lanez's single that was recorded at the David Camp studio. The young producer decided to release his first single "Call me" featuring (PS). The single get instant recognition by his new fans and ranked number 2 of the French Shazam charts, and ranked at number 100 on the US Shazam charts and 68th worldwide.
During 2018, he signed with Sony Music and release his latest song "Whatever" the video made it to the top 50 best pop music videos of the year.
